title: Disable progress from channel's header
Group Composer Post Button does not work
description:
### Summary

When using the new composer to created a post in a group, the post button does not unlock when you are finished writing your post.

### Steps to reproduce

1. in a group you have joined, use the old compose button to trigger composer
2. Compose a post
3. Post button does not work

### Platform information

Android 9

### App version

4.1.0 rc2

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

New composer post button to submit a post does not work when submitting a post to a group

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

New composer should work in groups

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/df92c695a5bc4e6be02d9ad469c8bcd1/image.png)

title: Onboarding Info Step Continue button disapears after entering birthdate
description:
### Summary

Onboarding Info Step Continue button disapears after entering birthdate

### Steps to reproduce

1. Onboard a new channel perform all the steps
2. Enter a birthdate greater than 18 years, need to enter date twice and continue button disappears.

### Platform information

Android 9

### App version

4.1.0 rc 2

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Continue button disappears after completing info step

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

continue button should be available after validating sms and confirming birth date.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![Screenshot_20200428-102140_Minds](/uploads/ef017ee79d601d1bcf0f98548ab3e044/Screenshot_20200428-102140_Minds.jpg)

title: Remove onboarding progress bar on channel until working correctly
description:
The Onboarding completion widget on channels is not working. We should remove this until it is working properly. See video.

I can't upload a video of the full process, but I have tried doing this many times and filling out the complete form, including verifying my phone number, but it always tells me I am not completed, and it does not seem to be remembering the information I enter for the Location, Birthday, and Phone (not depicted in video). You also have to press Continue twice on the final screen.

![RPReplay_Final1587671085](/uploads/8f6f7bd0d1f2cbab869578f29559bc56/RPReplay_Final1587671085.MP4)

title: Creating a remind looks skewed and has strange navigation back to composer
description:
See video. Confusing user experience.

Steps to replicate:
1. Click to remind a post with a native image.
2. Notice how much space there is for Speak Your Mind, there is far too much space
3. Click on the native image
4. Navigate back
5. Notice you are now in the composer, and not the Remind composer (where you just were) as expected.

![RPReplay_Final1587670888](/uploads/89ba40cb473065a529c3a16bbe3aaf5b/RPReplay_Final1587670888.MP4)

title: Navigation issues from Post Options
description:
Navigating back from tag manager is confusing. See steps to replicate below.

Steps to replicate:
1. Open composer
2. Go to text option
3. Click to add tags
4. Add a few hashtags
5. If you tap Done, it navigates you back to the Photo screen, which is confusing and makes it seem like nothing worked. It should take you to the status screen, where the tags show. If you tap back, it navigates you back to the Photo screen. It should also take you to the status screen. This is happening with all Post Options.

Solution: Any time you navigate back, or press "Done" in any Post Options, you should be navigated back to the Text screen, where you can see the status and any uploaded media if applicable.

title: Notifications shows empty message before it has loaded
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

The notifications empty message shows whilst still loading

### Steps to reproduce

Clear caches and navigate to notifications tab.

### Platform information

All platforms

### App version

4.1.x branch

### Possible fixes

Have the empty message acknowledge the loading state

title: In nav both sub counts link to subscribers
description:
### Summary

On the new settings screen, the subscribers and subscriptions link go to the same list of subscribers

### Steps to reproduce

Go to your channel
Underneath you user info, you'll see the count of subscribers and subscriptions. Subscriptions goes to the wrong page

### Platform information

All mobile

### App version

4.1.0 

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Subscriptions goes to the wrong page

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Subscriptions goes to list of subscriptions

![image](/uploads/d2aa4ff0d65e9ebd013d7a7b218888c4/image.png)

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

/label ~"T \- Bug" ~"S \- Triage:new"

Anchor Post Options to bottom behind keyboard
description:
### Summary

On devices with keyboard that take up 33% of screen you cannot see description when image is attached, title is written and keyboard is up. Temporary solution anchor post options to bottom of screen, hidden behind keyboard so there is room to see what you are typing when typing a description. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Use new composer to write a post with an image.
2. Write a title.
3. Attempt to write a description

### Platform information

Android 9, Galaxy 9s

### App version

4.1.0 rc3

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Cannot see description you are typing.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Hide postoptions behind keyboard so there is room to see what description you are typing.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/ed6738cde975b3162c95aa91b91d2ac6/image.png)


Relates to issue https://gitlab.com/minds/design/-/issues/21

title: Implement the main mobile channel screen
description:
Implement the main channel screen

https://design.minds.com/hosted/mobile/michael/mobile%23-channel/

When a user navigates to the new channel screen 

- [ ] It should be behind the "channel" feature flag on the backend
- [ ] Action buttons for meatball menu, wire, message if a subscriber, subscribe and unsubscribe button
- [ ] Subscribers count and Subscriptions count should go to the lists of subscribers and subscriptions (new screens in this epic)
- [ ] Channel name and badges, handle
- [ ] Description should fit to the screen with a linear gradient fade so the description text looks parallax and scroll
- [ ] Feed tabs
- [ ] Scroll list of the channel's feed with the new shared filter control
- [ ] Don't worry about the shop tab, it will come next sprint
- [ ] About tab with all the channel info
- [ ] DOB if they are the channel owner
- [ ] Subscribers, groups and subscriptions should all go to the appropriate list screen
- [ ] Light / Dark mode
- [ ] Unit tests and e2e tests

Soft lock state Wiring tokens
description:
### Summary

If you hit the back button when selecting a wallet when wiring tokens you can softlock yourself out of wiring tokens.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Start wiring tokens
2. select an amount of tokens to wire and submit
3. on the wallet select screen hit the back button
4. infinite loading circle, close wiring
5. attempt to wire again and you will error out.

### Platform information

Android 9

### App version

4.0.3

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Locked out of wiring

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

back button should not cause a cascade of errors.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![wire_lock_out](/uploads/3d78bb73df76e5424525cdae60be745e/wire_lock_out.mp4)

title: Token button cut off on IOS
description:

title: Check link regex to match browser behavior with emojis.
description:
### Summary

Browser app will detect urls with an emoji in front of them without a space. Mobile will not detect the url.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Create a post with a url right after an emoji with no space.
2. Look at post in browser and in mobile app

### Platform information

Any

### App version

4.0.2

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

url is not detected if there is no whitespace in front of it

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

url should be detected and link generated when there is an emoji in front of it.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

Browser

![image](/uploads/f2852317ace924adbef71b245fad6efb/image.png)

Mobile

![image](/uploads/f160224b60f68907ca6e9c01f3bc0060/image.png)

title: Add autoplay video to mobile
description:
We now have autoplay of videos on the front for pro / plus users

With the settings "enable autoplay" setting on in setting, videos should autoplay videos in activities.

- [ ] On feeds, one video should auto play with the sound muted while it is in the view port of the feed activities
- [ ] On individual media activities, the video should autoplay with the sound on (@ottman please, confirm if you want  single view to play with sound)
- [ ] Autoplay for our own videos and for embedded content

title: Default to Dialpad when entering phone numbers
description:
Android devices already load a phone number input on phones

But IOS on the ipad loads a full keyboard

We should just need to force the phone-pad property on our phone number inputs to get consistent behavior

https://reactnative.dev/docs/textinput#keyboardtype

title: update prettier v2 to support typescript's type imports
Disable sentry symbols upload for iOS on dev builds
merge 4.0.2 into 4.1.0
release 4.0.2
Newsfeed image size issues
description:
I suspect this is going to be a hard problem to solve consistently without rolling out a more adaptive layout system, but, this is a good place to start the conversation

@Johnthetester and Chesscats reported display issues with images on the feed. It's not just constrained to landscape mode. There's portrait mode images that overrun the view port as well.

![IMG_0CA149FECD66-1](/uploads/d88238a80613a82207e1d77dee37d139/IMG_0CA149FECD66-1.jpeg)

![IMG_159F912DC5C3-1](/uploads/6326efa1567505bbdc9b9f4e78995bfc/IMG_159F912DC5C3-1.jpeg)

This is, however, a hard problem.

If we scale portrait pictures down to fit in landscape, they will be very tiny and very narrow.

Same thing happens if we scale landscape photos down to fit on portrait, we will have a very tall viewport and a very thin and narrow image

Clipping and centering images so the post fits and so users can click through to see the whole thing might be the best way to solve this. But I'll defer to the @michaelfbradley @jotto141  and @ottman on how we want to address these layout issues.

title: Discover top image feed refresh causes error
description:
### Summary

Swipping up to refresh on a top image feed causes an error. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Do a discovery feed of top images or videos to bring up a tile view.
2. Tap on any image in the tile view.
3. This brings up a top image feed, try to refresh the feed by swiping up.

### Platform information

Android 9

### App version

4.0.2 rc 1

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

 Error occurs when trying to refresh on top feed

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

No error, maybe no refresh effect. I'm not sure a refresh makes sense in this context.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![20200324_155334](/uploads/6c82cebb31440e60e1301840da020134/20200324_155334.mp4)

title: Redesign the Wire Modals for Pay
description:
The design needs to be finalized for this one. It's just for redesigning the wire modals as part one of the Minds pay

https://design.minds.com/hosted/mobile/michael/mobile%23-pay/#artboard1

Credit card carousel

We should have all the existing functionality.

If we're using a 3rd party library, we could have problems with a native code.

title: TypeError: undefined is not an object (evaluating 't.item.username.toUpperCase')
description:
Sentry Issue: [MOBILE-Z4](https://sentry.io/organizations/minds-inc/issues/1515413540/?referrer=gitlab_integration)

```
TypeError: undefined is not an object (evaluating 't.item.username.toUpperCase')
  File "src/messenger/MessengerScreen.js", line 198, in _renderElement
    testID={row.item.username.toUpperCase()}
  File "app:///[native code]", in ml
  File "app:///[native code]", in fl
  File "app:///[native code]", in callImmediates
  File "app:///[native code]", in value
...
(24 additional frame(s) were not displayed)
```

Whenever I search of `martin` in messenger, this crashes and throws up the white error screen (IOS, App v4.0.1)

title: Implement the YT Importer settings screens (mobile)
description:
Under the "Other" Activity, add the UI for importing YT videos

https://design.minds.com/hosted/mobile/michael/mobile%23-youtube-migration/#artboard0

- [ ] Add yt importer settings under the new settings pages behind the "ytimporter" feature flag.

If the user entity does not have the "yt_connected" timestamp on their user model

- [ ] Show the Google oauth handler flow 

When the user authorizes the account call the v2/media/import/auth/:user_guid with the information required to link their accounts

If the user is connected

- [ ] Show a list of videos to import on the available screen. Paginated with infinite scroll
   - [ ] Limits should be coming from the backend 
   - [ ] Number of queued videos, number of videos being transferred
- [ ] Transfer all videos should kick off a backend request that cause the backend import to import all of the videos available and queue them up for transferring
- [ ] Cancel should send a request to the backend to delete the video from being transferred
- [ ] I suspect Canceling a video that is currently transferring is going to be very hard to do with the fire and forget nature of the transcoder. This feature should get postponed unless @eiennohi finds an easy way to kill a transcoder job mid flight.
- [ ] Transfer button on individual videos should schedule an individual video
- [ ] Transferred should show a list of all videos imported. Paginated with infinite scroll
- [ ] Empty screens for no videos on youtube or transferred
- [ ] Config sections that updates the user's imported web hooks and allows them to disconnect by calling a delete on the /media/video/auth endpoint
- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] E2E (not actually testing the YT integration, we'll need to confirm how detox handles 3rd party calls and mocked responses)

title: Zoom stuck after zooming in
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

Cannot zoom out after zooming in on an image on the mobile app.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Go to an image
2. Zoom in
3. Zoom out (and you can't)

### Platform information

S10 (10.0.0)

### App version

v4.0.1

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Cannot zoom out. Gesture doesn't work.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Should be able to zoom out.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

milestone.title: Mobile::4.2.0
milestone.description: This sprint is a maintenance sprint for mobile.

title: Change compose endpoints
Mobile app CR 3/22
description:
Composer

- [x] Ability to hold the compose button and record (let go to stop. Tap to record as well) from the base navigation (Or atleast from the red button)
- [x] Videos should automatically start looping to preview
- [x] Align licenses with web composer (take out all software licenses)
- [x] When you tap enable paywall, the checkmark doesn't switch
- [ ] Add Minds TV option to Monetize
- [x] Repeatedly getting "please try again in a moment..." error when trying to post
- [ ] on text input keyboard doesnt popup when tapping lower canvas region 
- [x] lag opening composer

Settings
- [ ] email settings missing 
- [x] The size of each settings section should be larger
- [x] Delete channel page undesigned
- [x] Language selector undesigned
- [x] Password requirements should be dynamic, not displayed in text
- [x] 2fa text is unaligned

@michaelfbradley @jotto141 please refer to this prior to doing your review so we don't overlap. Feel free to agree/disagree with my points and directly edit. Generally I feel like the text size is off all over the place.

title: Align web and mobile navs
description:
Add Newsfeed, Discovery, etc. to mobile navigations (even though those items exist on bottom bar). Multi access points is better and more clear for new users. @brianhatchet this has been approved by @michaelfbradley 


Web:

- [ ] Channel
- [ ] Newsfeed
- [ ] Discovery
- [ ] Wallet
- [ ] Boost
- [ ] Analytics
- [ ] Settings

Mobile:

- [ ] Channel
- [ ] Newsfeed
- [ ] Discovery
- [ ] Wallet
- [ ] Boost
- [ ] Analytics
- [ ] Settings
- [ ] Light/Dark Mode

title: Add a back button on the top of all settings screens for a consistent experience
description:
Add a back button to the main settings activity user's can easily go back

Make sure all settings screens have a back button

title: Turn on the wallet features for IOS, test and resubmit
description:
Let's try resubmitting our app to the apple store with our wallet, boost and wire functionality turned on

If we can control them through the unleash feature flags without causing massive activity headaches, we should do set it up so we can control this feature through gitlab.

- [ ] Turn on wallet features for ios
- [ ] Test all wallet, boost and wire to make sure everything works in ios
- [ ] Submit the app to apple as soon as possible so we can either get it approved or separate out what they reject
